name: structSome
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given struct and returns true, if one of the closure calls returns true

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The key for the current iteration
callback_params.name: key

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: A reference of the original struct
callback_params.name: struct

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true

examples.title: The simple StructSome example
examples.description: Here we have simple example about structsome function.
examples.code:
<cfscript>
var struct={"Name":"Raja","age":20,"mark":80};
result = structSome(struct,function(key,value){
	return key IS "Name"
});
writeOutput((result ? '' : 'No')& " Key Exists.")
</cfscript>

examples.title: The structSome member function example
examples.description: Here we have simple example about structsome as member function.
examples.code:
<cfscript>
var struct={"Name":"Raja","age":20,"mark":80};
result = struct.some(function(key,value){
	return key IS "average"
});
writeOutput((result ? '' : 'No')&" Key Exists.")
</cfscript>

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.
